channel.title: Making alter switch mage books...? (HELP PLZ)
channel.description: Can someone tell me what to add where so that mage books switch upon praying at the alter (with emote)?

item.title: Making alter switch mage books...? (HELP PLZ)
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

I’m not going to be mean. Even though you are being a fag by multi posting.

if (command.startsWith("switch")){ NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; animation(435, absY, absX); RemoveAllWindows(); if (ancients == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 0; sendMessage("You convert to normal magic!"); } else { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 1; sendMessage("You convert to ancient magicks!"); } }

Thats the command so you just need to make the object do it.

if(objectID == ####) { NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; animation(435, absY, absX); RemoveAllWindows(); if (ancients == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 0; sendMessage("You convert to normal magic!"); } else { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 1; sendMessage("You convert to ancient magicks!"); } }

Or some shit.

Read full topic
